title: [Question] Admission procedure.
content:
I'm taking admission after the 3rd rnd. 
1. Do have to pay any extra fee? (Lab fee etc. .)
2. How much time will the procedure take?
3. Are parents req?

comments.body:
whatever kea has said you have to pay that much while joining. 

admission will take like 4-6hrs depending on the crowd. but if you are planning to join college hostel that will take much time.

  
for admission a gaurdian is enough but for hostel you need a parent.
